BEFORE:
img_flat = img.view(img.size(0), -1)
        validity = self.model(img_flat)

        return validity
AFTER:
x = img.view(img.size(0), -1)
        x = F.leaky_relu(self.fc1(x), 0.2)
        x = F.dropout(x, 0.3)
        x = F.leaky_relu(self.fc2(x), 0.2)
        x = F.dropout(x, 0.3)
        x = F.leaky_relu(self.fc3(x), 0.2)
        x = F.dropout(x, 0.3)
        return torch.sigmoid(self.fc4(x))
